name: Paper Dash - City Hustle
description:
Set off on a relaxing journey in "Paper Dash - City Hustle”.


Glide as a tiny paper plane through expansive, lively cityscapes, discovering hidden nooks and evading mischievous ghosts.

With a simple shot, clear your path and keep soaring. Tackle waves of playful foes in a world that grows with every victory, blending serene exploration with gentle, captivating challenges.

Dive into "Paper Dash - City Hustle," where the thrill of discovery meets the joy of flight in a relaxing flight adventure.

Embark on a relaxing adventure as you take on the role of a courageous paper plane hunting down evil ghosts that haunt vibrant worlds across dimensions.


Soar through captivating landscapes, from mystical forests to scary mansions, in search of these malevolent spirits. Utilize your flying skills and shoot all the ghosts, restore peace, and bring harmony to the realms in this visually stunning game.

Paper Dash – City Hustle is an interactive game experience that is designed to ease your mind and have fun finding and shooting little ghosts.
Fast, relaxed, chaotic - You are free to enjoy the game any way you see fit as the only enemies of the game are ghosts that stay in place floating ominously.

The movement is fast but the world itself is somewhat peaceful. This enables you to lean back and enjoy the different levels and the sensation of flying. It is an excellent game for relaxing and blowing off some steam after an exhausting day of hassle.

Singleplayer Story Mode:


You start as a tiny paper plane in a giant world. You move continuously forward and are free to fly wherever you want.

After you have played around a little and enjoyed the sensation of flying as well as explored the giant environments for the first time you start to discover nearby areas. Very soon you will find all those pesky ghosts floating around in the environment.

Soon you will figure out that there is a solution to the problem. Just shoot at them!
Keep an eye on the counter to see if you have enemies left to find and follow the arrow that's conveniently pointing you towards them.

Once you have destroyed all ghosts in a level, a second wave of them will spawn, and later a third and a fourth wave. Every level is structured in 4 waves and once you have finished all of them, you can enter the next level and explore more of the giant world with your small paper plane.

The overall game is still pretty relaxing as after all your enemies are balloons and do very little to defeat themselves from your attacks. It’s a unique mix of exploration, relaxation, and a minimalistic ghost combat system that brings fun without the need for too much thinking or strategizing.
